hero.title: Design and development
work.title: Work Methodology
work.card1description: Interface design focused on structure, hierarchy, and usability. From initial concepts to final layouts.
work.card2description: Responsive, accessible, and maintainable interfaces built with modern frontend technologies.
work.card3description: Clear communication, well-defined decisions, and an organized workflow throughout the entire project.
projects.title: Recent Work
projects.card1context: Context: Comprehensive employment management platform with three user profiles (Operators, Companies, and Administrators).
projects.card1challenge: Challenge: Transform a technical tool created by backend profiles into an intuitive and attractive interface for diverse users, from university students to retirees.
projects.card1impact: Impact: Led frontend development in React, designing and implementing complex dashboards with data visualization, survey charts, and campaign creation flows, working closely with the backend team to integrate critical functionalities.
projects.card2context: Context: Strategic landing page for the platform's production launch.
projects.card2challenge: Challenge: Convert visitors into active registrations for companies and operators through a professional online presence.
projects.card2impact: Impact: Worked as a freelancer transforming Figma designs into React code, optimizing the responsive experience and adding animations that significantly increased conversion metrics and business inquiries.
projects.card3context: Context: Institutional landing page for a building management administration.
projects.card3challenge: Challenge: Build the digital identity of a new startup from scratch, prioritizing clarity and trust.
projects.card3impact: Impact: Handled the end-to-end process: from visual interface design to final development in React, achieving a digital 'cover letter' that effectively communicates the client's values and work methodology.
projects.card4context: Context: Administrative dashboard for cinematographic content.
projects.card4challenge: Challenge: Develop a scalable management tool with creative freedom in design and technical architecture.
projects.card4impact: Impact: Built an original interface consuming external APIs, focusing on creating complex and reusable components and efficient state management for catalog administration.
about.title: About me
about.text1: I am a frontend developer and web designer with a clear mission: to transform complex systems into intuitive and human digital experiences.
about.text2: My profile sits at the intersection of design and code. I have had the challenge of leading the frontend in purely technical teams, where my role was to translate robust data architectures into attractive and easy-to-use interfaces for all users.
about.text3: When I'm not in front of the screen, you'll probably find me grabbing a coffee and looking for inspiration for new ideas.
contact.title: Let's talk!
contact.description: Have a project in mind? Write to me so we can evaluate it together.
